Question 5 et 6

```{r}
resultats = c()
ys = c()
for(i in 1:1000)
{
  y = rnorm(1, mean = 0, sd = 2)
  res = rnorm(1, mean = 2*y, sd = 4)
  resultats = c(resultats, res)
  ys = c(ys, y)
}
hist(resultats)
plot(ys, resultats, col = "grey")
```
